name: Science City
description: Science City Kapurthala, otherwise known as Pushpa Gujral Science City is a haven for science enthusiasts established by the Government of Punjab.

name: Wonderland
address: Jalandhar - Nakodar Rd, Wadala Chowk, After, Jalandhar, Punjab 144001
description: Park with family-friendly rides, including a small roller coaster, plus water slides & a wave pool.

name: Rangla Punjab
address: Jalandhar - Phagwara Highway, Khajurla, Grand Trunk Rd, Next to Haveli, Jalandhar, Punjab 144001
description: Highliting the rich culture of punjab, Rangla punjab is the best place to learn about the culture of punjab and to hang out with family.

name: Rainak Bazar
description: Rainak Bazaar also known as the wholesale market. One can always find amazing things for cheapest price.
